headline: Is Lockheed Martin a Hidden Bargain After Recent Defense Contracts Win?
summary: Ever wondered if Lockheed Martin is priced just right, undervalued, or maybe a hidden gem in the defense sector? You are not alone, and figuring out its real worth could be your edge. The stock has edged up 0.2% in the past week but is still down 3.3% over the past month, with a 1.2% gain year-to-date and a -7.6% return over the past year. These figures hint at shifting expectations and possibly changing levels of risk. Recent headlines have focused on new contract...

headline: Binary Defense Appoints Dr. Aaron Estes as Vice President of Product
summary: CLEVELAND, November 04, 2025--Binary Defense names Dr. Aaron Estes VP of Product to lead AI, automation, & deception tech, including automated moving target defense (AMTD).

raw.headline: Binary Defense Appoints Dr. Aaron Estes as Vice President of Product

headline: Most Trump Ballroom Donors Have Federal Contracts, Watchdog Says
summary: Sixteen of the 24 donors have received federal contracts with the cumulative sum totaling $279 billion over the past five years, according to the study by Public Citizen.  The majority of those awards have gone to defense contractor Lockheed Martin Corp., which has been awarded $191 billion in federal contracts during that period, according to the group founded by liberal activist Ralph Nader.
